AAclust Module¶

class aaanalysis.aaclust.AAclust(model=None, model_kwargs=None, name_unclassified='unclassified', verbose=False)[source]¶

k-free wrapper for clustering algorithm to create redundancy reduced sets of numerical scales

cluster_naming(names=None, labels=None, name_unclassified='Unclassified')[source]¶

Change cluster labels by scale names

static correlation(X_test, X_ref, labels_test=None, labels_ref=None, n=3, positive=True, on_center=False, except_unclassified=True)[source]¶

Compute cluster centers from reference list and correlation of test array with centers

fit(X, names=None, on_center=True, min_th=0, merge_metric='euclidean', n_clusters=None)[source]¶

Get hierarchy of cluster categories based on list of minimum correlation thresholds.
